name: Automatic Linux Apache Server with mySQL
tagline: Setup apache server with mysql and php
body: Apache Server Setup =================== This is the easyest way to setup an apache server. The script will make an update to OS and install all the dependency for OS. Then it will install the following: - Apache - mySQL - PHP5 After the instalation is compleated apache will restart. How to use ? ============== If you dont have PERL install, open your terminal and type: apt-get install perl Once the PERL is installed type: perl install_server.sh or ./install_server.sh And follow the instruction on screen.
